1.name: Arabian sea
1.story: Nemo is missing . You are Nemo's friend . You are an Amphibian . You're able to breathe both on land and in water .You Let's start looking for him .He is a tiny fish in this vast ocean . It's gonna be a long journey ! You have 2 choices . 1 swim aimlessly or 2 Take help from an investigative agency .
1.nav: Press 1 to swim aimlessly , Press 2 to go to an investigative agency

2.name: swim
2.story: Why would you think he's here . This is so far from home .

3.name: World ocean investigative
3.story: An old shack welcomes you . The board has "World ocean investigative " written on it.
3.nav: Press 1 to go to go to the reception

4.name: shack
4.story: You enter the shack ! The shack isn't as bad as it feels from outside . There is another room in the shack . SEEMS DARK . And a helpline number incase you find no one in the lobby .
4.nav: Press 1 to go to the dark room (hey , maybe someone is there ) or Press 2 to call the helpline

5.name: Shark
5.story: Why would you even enter a dark room in a completely strange looking shack . A strange looking shark  pounces on you and eats you . You died 'cause you couldn't choose right . IT'S NOT ME . IT'S YOU

6.name: Helpline
6.story: You call the helpline and an investigator meets you in the reception . He asks you the last whereabouts of Nemo . He wants to see the spot where you saw Nemo for the last time
6.nav: press 1 to take the investigator to the last seen spot

7.name: Crime spot
7.story: The investigator looks around . But oops !! The evidence is destroyed in water . He suggests to take the help of police
7.nav: press 1 to go to go to the police station

8.name: Police Station
8.story: The police is busy . But investigator suggested bribing one of the officers to get the things done easily or wait till you find a honest police officer (which may take time! )
8.nav: press 1 to bribe the police or 2 to wait for a honest police officer

9.name: bribe
9.story: Bribing is a punishable offense . And you can get a jail term upto 14 years . Your ass is out of my game !

10.name: Honest Police
10.story: Yay ! You waited and you met a very honest police officer who wants to help you with your nemo's case . He asks you to wait in his office
10.nav: press 1 to go to his office

11.name: office
11.story: You waited in the office and the police officer came 2 tips about nemo . He says Nemo is either in antarctica or in Bali sea . You decide to follow the tips . Now choose
11.nav: press 1 to go to Antarctica and 2 to go to Bali

12.name: Antarctica
12.story: I understand you are an Amphibian and that shit gives you lot of confidence . But You just froze to death . And anyways Nemo hated winters . You knew that !

13.name: Bali
13.story: You decided to go to Bali to follow the tip . Bali is a tropical island . You land in the airport . You see a random cab and you have an option to call a registered cab . Registered cab will take time to come .
13.nav: press 1 to enter the random cab or press 2 to wait for the registered cab

14.name: random cab
14.story: You didn't know what you were getting into . The driver takes your possessions and kills you . You're dead

15.name: registered cab
15.story: You chose right ! The registered cab driver safely takes you to the hotel near the beach and you have now access to the closest waterbody . You have two options . Start searching the hotels and then move to waterbody or search in the sea
15.nav: Press 1 to choose hotels or press 2 for searching the sea

16.name: Hotels
16.story: I donï¿½t know how dumb you can be ! Nemo's a fish ! Game over

17.name: Bali Sea
17.story: You enter the sea at night ! You are lost again . It's a huge space . To start , you decide to observe the fish movement patterns of the sea .

18.name: observe
18.story: While observing you find a school of fish . You can either decide to check the school or avoid them and focus on observation .
18.nav: press 1 to check the school or 2 to avoid them

19.name: avoid
19.story: Why did you avoid ? What If Nemo was in that school ? Now you ain't gonna get him .

20.name: School
20.story: You see some kids and there !! YOU FOUND NEMO . But what is it ? Who is he with ? OHHHHHHH he ran away with his boyfriend ! Tough world to be gay . He asks for your blessings and acceptance
20.nav: press 1 to accept him press 2 to Reject him

21.name: Reject
21.story: Showed your true colours eh ! OUT OF MY GAME I'd say but It's okay . Take your time to understand your friend . Be happy in his happiness .

22.name: Accept
22.story: A true friend ! You've found Nemo ! And you've proved yourself to be a true friend . Happy Journey back !
